other_tests.findings: The liver is normal in echogenicity, without focal lesions. There is normal hepatopetal flow in the portal vein. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilation. The common duct measures 6 mm. Gallbladder is normal without stones, sludge, wall edema, or pericholecystic fluid. Ultrasonographic ___ sign is negative. Pancreas was not visualized, due to shadowing bowel gas. Partially imaged in the upper pole of the right kidney is a 6.8 cm cyst, with single thin internal septation.
